HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.heroDescription: A modern, multilingual Next.js boilerplate with internationalization, Zod error translation, and BetterAuth integration, Prisma for database management, and Resend for email. Easily build secure, production-ready applications in multiple languages.
